text.skinlayers.title: Configurações do 3D Skin Layer
text.skinlayers.enable.hat.tooltip: Render the player's hat layer as a 3D model
text.skinlayers.enable.jacket.tooltip: Render the player's jacket layer as a 3D model
text.skinlayers.enable.leftsleeve.toolti: Render the player's left sleeve layer as a 3D model
text.skinlayers.enable.rightsleeve.toolt: Render the player's right sleeve layer as a 3D model
text.skinlayers.enable.leftpants.tooltip: Render the player's left pants layer as a 3D model
text.skinlayers.enable.rightpants.toolti: Render the player's right pants layer as a 3D model
text.skinlayers.renderdistancelod.toolti: The distance at which the model will switch to a lower level of detail(vanilla 2d)
text.skinlayers.basevoxelsize.tooltip: The size of the voxels used for players
text.skinlayers.headvoxelsize.tooltip: The size of the voxels used for the player's head
text.skinlayers.bodyvoxelheightsize.tool: The height of the voxels used for the player's body(used to prevent clipping into the head/sticking out of the arms)
text.skinlayers.bodyvoxelwidthsize.toolt: The width of the voxels used for the player's torso(used to prevent clipping into the arms)
text.skinlayers.skulls.enable.tooltip: Render players heads(the block) as a 3D model
text.skinlayers.skullsitems.enable.toolt: Render players heads(the item) as a 3D model
text.skinlayers.skulls.voxelsize.tooltip: The size of the voxels used for players heads(the block/item)
text.skinlayers.fastrender.enable.toolti: Render the 3D models as fast as possible, this may cause some graphical glitches with transparency
text.skinlayers.firstperson.voxelsize: Tamanho do Voxel em Primeira Pessoa
text.skinlayers.firstperson.voxelsize.to: The size of the voxels used for the player's hand in first person
